entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers late this morning and early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning and early this afternoon. Blowing snow this morning. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:36 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
